text: "I Just Can't Stop Loving You" is a classic song by American singer Michael Jackson, featuring singer and songwriter Siedah Garrett. It's a ballad expressing deep love and devotion, and it was released as part of his 1987 album Bad. The song features a beautiful duet and showcases Jackson's signature vocal style. The song does not have a music video, but it was performed live by Jackson during the Bad and Dangerous world tours. It was also going to be performed for the This Is It concerts, but it was cancelled due to his sudden death in 2009. Category:Michael Jackson songs Category:1987 songs
title: I Just Can't Stop Loving You
